## Recommendations

1. **SYN-24 (P0-Critical) is stale**: "Complete Mastery IIC account email setup" hasn't been updated since Feb 6 and carries a P0-Critical label. This needs immediate Sovereign attention.
2. **All 20 issues are unassigned**: No owner accountability exists. Assign agents or Sovereign ownership to at least the In Progress and High Priority items.
3. **In Progress items stale 9 days**: SYN-51 (Jira onboarding) and SYN-53 (Todoist onboarding) moved to In Progress on Feb 11 but have had no updates since. Verify progress or revert to Todo.
4. **Board-wide stagnation**: Every single active issue is stale (>7 days without update). This suggests either the board isn't being used as the active tracking surface, or work is happening without Linear updates.
5. **Consolidate PM tool onboarding**: SYN-51/52/53/54 are all PM tool onboarding tasks. Sequence them rather than parallelizing to reduce context-switching.
6. **Backlog hygiene**: SYN-17 and SYN-19 (both P3-Low, cli:openclaw, untouched since Feb 6) should be either promoted with a concrete plan or archived to reduce noise.
